title: [Shimeria's General Store]
[Shimeria's Weaponry]
[Shimeria's Magic Shoppe]
[Shimeria's Outfitting]
description: Beneath a mosaic tiled ceiling, a midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the black marble floor.
